sentences.sContent: He has no compunction about relating how he killed his father.
sentences.sCn: 他毫无悔意地讲述了他如何杀死自己的父亲。

remMethod.val: com＋punct(刺， 点)＋ion → (心)不断被刺 → 良心不安

trans.tranOther: If you say that someone has no compunction about doing something, you mean that they do it without feeling ashamed or guilty
